erlang.name: Erlang/OTP
erlang.description: Programming language for concurrent, fault-tolerant systems

jre.name: Java Runtime Environment
jre.description: Java runtime for running Java applications

rust.name: Rust
rust.description: Rust programming language and cargo package manager

node.name: Node.js
node.description: JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine

build-essential.name: Build Tools
build-essential.description: C/C++ compiler and build tools (gcc, make, etc.)
build-essential.notes: macOS: Install Xcode Command Line Tools with 'xcode-select --install'. Windows: Install Visual Studio Build Tools.

arangodb.name: ArangoDB
arangodb.description: Multi-model database for graphs, documents, and key-value

clickhouse.name: ClickHouse
clickhouse.description: Column-oriented OLAP database for real-time analytics

couchdb.name: CouchDB
couchdb.description: Document-oriented NoSQL database with HTTP API
couchdb.notes: Source builds require Erlang; Windows MSI includes bundled Erlang

foundationdb.name: FoundationDB
foundationdb.description: Distributed key-value store with ACID transactions

influxdb.name: InfluxDB
influxdb.description: Time-series database for metrics and events

libsql.name: libSQL
libsql.description: SQLite fork with server mode and replication

qdrant.name: Qdrant
qdrant.notes: No linux-arm64 binary; use Docker or build from source with Rust

questdb.name: QuestDB
questdb.description: Time-series database for fast SQL queries
questdb.notes: macOS no-jre builds require Java; Linux/Windows bundles include JRE

redis.name: Redis
redis.notes: No official pre-built binaries; source requires compilation

rocksdb.name: RocksDB
rocksdb.notes: Embedded library; typically built as dependency, not standalone

sqlite.name: SQLite
sqlite.notes: darwin-arm64 uses x64 binary via Rosetta

tidb.name: TiDB
tidb.description: Distributed SQL database with MySQL compatibility
tidb.notes: TiUP is the recommended installation method

timescaledb.name: TimescaleDB
timescaledb.notes: PostgreSQL extension; requires PostgreSQL installation first

valkey.name: Valkey
valkey.description: Redis-compatible in-memory data store (Linux Foundation fork)
valkey.notes: No Windows binary; use WSL or Docker

pgcli.name: pgcli
pgcli.description: PostgreSQL CLI with auto-completion and syntax highlighting

mycli.name: mycli
mycli.description: MySQL CLI with auto-completion and syntax highlighting

litecli.name: litecli
litecli.description: SQLite CLI with auto-completion and syntax highlighting

iredis.name: iredis
iredis.description: Redis CLI with auto-completion and syntax highlighting

usql.name: usql
usql.description: Universal SQL CLI for PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and more

tiup.name: TiUP
tiup.description: TiDB package manager and cluster manager
